message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $11,500. I believe it's a fair price considering its value. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,800. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product and my budget.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm looking for something closer to my initial asking price.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $11,150?
I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $10,800, but I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. How about we try $11,000?
